data.name: Advisor
data.value: You have not accessed the advisor yet.

data.name: BarracksRecruitTime
data.value: This is not correct. Remember that you can ignore the decimal part of the number. So if the recruitment time factor is 40.45%, all you have to enter is "40" in the text box.

data.name: BattleSimCM
data.value: This is not correct. Remember to run the simulation with defender's wall and towers both at level 0

data.name: BattleSimLC
data.value: This is not correct. Remember to run the simulation with defender's wall and towers both at level 0

data.name: BattleSimLCWithWall
data.value: This is not correct. Did you remember to run the simulation with defender's wall and towers both at level 10?

data.name: BattleSimRamAndTreb
data.value:
This is not correct.
- Did you remember to run the simulation with defender's wall and towers both at level 10?
- Did you remember to include 40 rams and 40 trebuchets with the attack?
- Did you remember to target defensive towers with the trebuchets?
- Did you remember to set Defender's Wall Research Defence Bonus to 0%?

data.name: BattleSimSpies
data.value: This is not correct. Make sure you enter the exact number which includes the decimal part.

data.name: ClanLeaders
data.value: Nope, that's not correct. Remember that you must be part of a clan, and name one of the 'Owners' of your clan

data.name: ClanMates
data.value: I don't see any post made by you...

data.name: DefenseFactor
data.value: This is not correct. Make sure you only enter a number. You do not need to enter the decimal part either.

data.name: Food
data.value: This is not correct. Your food consumption is before the '/' and food production after the '/'.

data.name: Friends
data.value:
This is not the correct number. Please make sure you are checking the correct realm!

If you are having trouble, note that there could be a discrepancy between Realm of Empires and Facebook's friend count therefore check your Number of Friends on the Friend Network Ranking screen and enter this number instead. You will see yourself highlighted when you go to this screen. Access this screen from the Ranking menu item.

data.name: InfantryRecruitTime
data.value: This is not correct. Remember that you only need to enter minutes. So if you see recruitment time to be "00:15:30", meaning 15 minutes, 30 seconds, you only need to enter 15 in the text box.

data.name: Invite
data.value: You have not clicked the invite button yet.

data.name: JoinClan
data.value: You are not part of a clan yet.

data.name: MyPoints
data.value: This is not correct. You must go to the Player Ranking screen accessible from the Ranking navigation icon to get this information.

data.name: NoRoomInTreasury
data.value:
You cannot accept the reward at this time since your treasury does not have enough room!

You currently have {0} silver and your treasury can hold up to {1} silver, this leaves room for only {2} silver.

You must spend some of your silver (by upgrading some buildings for example) before claiming your reward OR upgrade your treasury so that it can hold more.

data.name: NoRoomInTreasury2
data.value:
You cannot accept the reward at this village since your treasury does not have enough room!

Switch to a different village or spend some of your silver before claiming your reward.

data.value: I do not see any messages sent by you at all? Remember that the only way to be sure a player is inactive, is to try to contact him/her. Please do so for this quest.

data.name: D2_Mail
data.value: Looks like you haven't starred any messages. Go to Mail and click on the star on the message you want to keep. You can unstar it later by clicking it again.
